EmailTemplate.name: 17.NokION.XLE.Retail.N.G.N.17804.Retail Nurture.Email 5
EmailTemplate.subject: Moving legacy retail IT infrastructure to the cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Retailer’s TCO for moving to the cloud To support your company’s digital transformation, investments must be measured against cost savings over time. You need to know how migration from a legacy to a cloud environment will impact total cost of ownership (TCO).
Read "Moving from legacy to a cloud environment" <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2210.Whats.your.TCO.for.moving.to.the.cloud.html]]> to understand the five-year financial impacts. Sincerely,Cindy BergevinHead of Retail Marketing, NokiaEmail: cindy.bergevin@nokia.com <[[mailto:cindy.bergevin@nokia.com]]>
Visit https://networks.nokia.com/retail <[[https://networks.nokia.com/retail]]> Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
